name: Mars Sky Attack 3D - skyforce 2015
description:
*****Our planet is under attack by frightening aliens*******

You, your beloved people and our world, all are the victim of alien abduction.

And it is clearly your rights and civic responsibility to learn the skills necessary to protect yourself, your loved ones and ultimately your planet. Then, Mars Sky Attack 3D is the best for you.

SIMPLE, FUN & ADDICTIVE
Easy and Intuitive Controls, instant and addictive non-stop action!

Completely Free
Hours of Free fun fly and shoot

Vivid 3D Visuals
Realistic & smooth 3D graphics

DOWNLOAD NOW!
